lyric.text:
Chord Kucari WajahMu

Bait :
Ku[D]cari Wajah[G/D]Mu, Te[D]mukan Kasih[G]Mu
Kau Bu[Em]kan Tuhan Yang [A]Jauh Dari[G/D]ku   [D]   [A]
Ku[D]panggil Nama[G/D]Mu, Ku[D]dengar Jawab[G]Mu
Kau Tu[Em]han Yang S’lalu [D/F#]Dengar Se[G]ruan Hati[A]ku

Sungguh [D]Indah Kau Tuhan
Penuh [D/F#]Kasih Dan Sa[G]yang
Kau Tem[Em]pat Penghibu[D/F#]ran
Bagi Setiap Ha[G]ti Yang Terlu[A]ka

Mena[D/F#]ra Perlindung[G]an
Kau Sum[Em]ber Kekua[D/F#]tan

Chord Way Maker (Leeland)

Verse 1 :
You Are H[A]ere, Moving In Ou[E]r Midst
I Worship Y[B]ou, I Worship Y[C#m]ou

Waymaker, Miracle Worker
[E]Promise Keeper
Light In The Darkness  [B]

Waymaker, Miracle Worker
[E]Promise Keeper

Verse 2 :

That Is Who You [C#m]Are

[B]  You Never Stop

  You Never Stop Working
